page_content: The page provides various directives and guidelines related to forest management, biodiversity, and natural hazards.
The page provides information about an upcoming cycling race, including the route and safety instructions.
The page discusses the acquittal of an auxiliary supervisor who was previously accused of violating federal hunting and weapons laws.
The page warns about "Microsoft-Support" scams and provides guidelines on how to avoid falling victim to such scams.
The page announces the finalists for the Innovation Prize of the Canton of Fribourg, including companies with software-related innovations.
The page provides information about the annual civil defense siren test, including the schedule and what the different siren tones mean.
The page offers the FriTax software for electronic tax filing and provides installation instructions for different operating systems.
The page provides information about the annual Freiburg Mobility Week, promoting sustainable mobility options like walking, cycling, and public transport.
The page provides information on e-Tax JP, an online service for filing corporate tax returns, and offers related forms and documents.
The page discusses the Canton of Fribourg's strategy for COVID-19 testing and contact tracing, mentioning the use of WHO-provided software for tracking.
The page provides guidelines for remote teaching and introduces the deployment of Office 365 for teachers and students in the Canton of Fribourg.
